pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile Regression // Estimation and inference methods for models of conditional quantiles: Linear and nonlinear parametric and non-parametric (total variation penalized) models for conditional quantiles of a univariate response and several methods for handling censored survival data. Portfolio selection methods based on expected shortfall risk are also now included. See Koenker (2006) doi:10.1017/CBO9780511754098 and Koenker et al. (2017) doi:10.1201/9781315120256.
